meta.title: DevOps & Cloud Infrastructure Services — House of Agile • Switzerland • Germany
meta.description: Expert DevOps and cloud infrastructure services for family offices and private clients in Switzerland and Germany. Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, GCP, Azure, Linux administration, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure automation with Ansible and Terraform.
meta.ogTitle: DevOps & Cloud Infrastructure Services — House of Agile
meta.ogDescription: Expert DevOps and cloud infrastructure services for family offices and private clients. Kubernetes, Docker, AWS, GCP, Azure, Linux administration.

hero.title: Enterprise-Grade Infrastructure for
hero.description: Our expert collective delivers sophisticated DevOps and cloud infrastructure solutions for family offices and private clients in Switzerland and Germany. From Docker and Kubernetes orchestration to multi-cloud deployments and Linux system administration.

containerOrchestration.title: Container Orchestration
containerOrchestration.description: Expert deployment and management of containerized applications at scale. Our team specializes in Docker and Kubernetes orchestration, ensuring high availability, scalability, and efficient resource utilization.

multiCloud.title: Multi-Cloud Infrastructure
multiCloud.description: Comprehensive cloud infrastructure design and deployment across AWS, Google Cloud Platform, and Azure. We architect resilient, cost-optimized solutions tailored to your specific requirements.
features: Compute Engine, Cloud Storage, Cloud Functions (GCP)

linuxAdmin.title: Expert Linux Administration
linuxAdmin.description: Deep expertise in Linux system administration with decades of experience managing production environments. We ensure your infrastructure is secure, performant, and reliable.

cicdAutomation.title: CI/CD & Infrastructure Automation
cicdAutomation.description: Streamline your development workflow with robust CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure as code. We implement automated testing, deployment, and configuration management to accelerate delivery and reduce errors.
features: Automated build, test, and deployment pipelines

monitoring.title: Monitoring & Observability
monitoring.description: Comprehensive monitoring and logging solutions to maintain visibility into your infrastructure. We implement alerting, metrics collection, and log aggregation for proactive issue detection.

environmentManagement.title: Environment & Deployment Management
environmentManagement.description: Sophisticated management of development, staging, and production environments. We establish deployment strategies that ensure stability, traceability, and rapid rollback capabilities.

cta.title: Ready to Elevate Your Infrastructure?
cta.description: Schedule a confidential consultation to discuss your DevOps and cloud infrastructure needs.
